lead_paragraph: Borders Group's chief executive, Bennett LeBow, cemented his control over the bookstore chain after shareholders approved a move to issue Mr. LeBow warrants that could give him a stake of as much as 35 percent in the company, Publishers Weekly reported.
snippet: Borders Group's chief executive, Bennett LeBow, cemented his control over the bookstore chain after shareholders approved a move to issue Mr. LeBow warrants that could give him a stake of as much as 35 percent.
